name: project-ignite
description: Standalone realtime security scanners - AI Secure Coding, OSS, Secrets, IaC, and Containers

checkmarx.MCP.markdownDescription: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) provides advanced contextual analysis for secure coding. [**Install MCP**](command:ast-results.installMCP)

Checkmarx AI Secure Coding Assistant (AS.markdownDescription: Scans your code files for security best practices as you code

Checkmarx Open Source Realtime Scanner (.markdownDescription: Scans your manifest files as you code

Checkmarx Secret Detection Realtime Scan.markdownDescription: Scans your files for potential secrets and credentials as you code

Checkmarx Containers Realtime Scanner.Ac.markdownDescription: Scans your Docker files and container configurations as you code

Checkmarx IAC Realtime Scanner.Activate.markdownDescription: Scans your Infrastructure as Code files as you code

Checkmarx IAC Realtime Scanner.Container.description: Containers Management Tool for IaC Scanner
Checkmarx IAC Realtime Scanner.Container.markdownDescription: Select the Containers Management Tool to use for IaC scanning.

CheckmarxKICS.Activate KICS Real-time Sc.markdownDescription: Scans your infrastructure as code files for vulnerabilities, upon file save. **No Checkmarx credentials required.** [Read more](https://docs.checkmarx.com/en/34965-68744-using-the-checkmarx-vs-code-extension---kics-auto-scanning.html).

CheckmarxKICS.Additional Parameters.markdownDescription: Customize the scan configuration using KICS scan command flags, [see KICS help page](https://docs.kics.io/latest/commands/).

CheckmarxSecurityChampion.key.markdownDescription: API key used to connect to OpenAI.

CheckmarxSecurityChampion.model.markdownDescription: The OpenAI model used by AI Security Champion. This will be overridden if a user-defined model is specified below.

CheckmarxSecurityChampion.customModel.markdownDescription: If your organization's preferred OpenAI model is not available in the selection menu above, you can enter a custom model here. Optional
